this is kayte.. i think i died, but i believe i shall be rising from the dead soon.

-kayte

come check out my new blend challenge site

<lj user="glitz_n_glam">

-kayte

here's a random icon i just made.. i learned how to do it today.. i figured it out. i'd lyk to say something about a comment a received in my friends only post.. it was pretty immature and i didn't feel lyk wasting my time on it.. so i deleted it. let me just tell you a bit about my views on life.. starting with.. A) there is no PUNK BIBLE no rules.. no guidelines.. no regulations.. nothing.. B) I never once stated throughout this entire journal that i was punk, hippie, ghetto, or goth... not once... who the fuck are you to think i am "something" anyways? if you fall against stereotypical labels.. you're right up there with the lamest of them. I'd just lyk to say that I've never claimed to be something i wasn't.. so if u think that i'm a "poser" don't waste your typing for a finger cramp.. because frankly.. i don't give a flying fuck what you think i am. this is a computer. these are words. there's not going to be any hurt feelings running through these wires.. so save your shyt for someone who's gonna listen. I may be reacting this time, but I won't be soon. C) I can wear whatever i want, listen to whatever i want, and act whatever way i want without you judging me. this is a place where i make graphics, not a place where i reach out and look for your opinions on my personality. I don't give a fuck.. that should be enough for you to understand.. and if it's not.. don't bother commenting.. because i won't reply, and you won't get your satisfaction. D) If you don't lyk me or my journal.. you don't have to participate in it.. nobody is holding a gun to your head so rest assured. and one more thing.. i need some help.. i can't keep this journal up by myself. I'm looking for maybe one or two talented graphics makers who I can trust to help me.. if you're interested.. IM me kissmyoassoclass so we can talk and i can get some examples of your work. sowry for this bytchy post, but i was really pissed off... -kayte

hi.. im kayte, i own this journal, therefore.. i make the god damn rules.. and this journal is friends only. look for more information on why, and what u have to do to become one of my favorite friends.. so add me.. you're in for a good time also... my two new artists are Cera - graphics - and Caitlin - blinkies - check out the userinfo to learn more about them.. YOU MUST COMMENT TO BE ADDED.. I'M NOT GOING TO COME AND FIND YOU BY CONSTANTLY CHECKING MY USERINFO... ALSO!!!! ADD ME FIRST! IF I ADD YOU AND YOU HAVEN'T ADDED ME BACK WITHIN A DAY, I'LL TAKE YOU OFF MY LIST...SOWRY, IT'S JUST THE WAY I WORK -kayte
the above illustration was made by natalie dee of nataliedee.com, i made the friends only banner with that as my inspiration... if you would lyk to check out some of my work please visit i am GLITZ and I made the layout, userinfo pictures, main icon, and friends only banner, along with various icons and graphics throughout the journal. i took my livejournal name out because i don't want random people poking into my life
